Plot: In the 18th century, a vampire escapes from the freak show she once participated in and teams up with a group of vampire slayers to kill the man who raped her mother.
Title: BloodRayne
Actors: Kristanna Loken, Michael Madsen, Matthew Davis, Will Sanderson
tomatoConsensus: BloodRayne is an absurd sword-and-sorcery vid-game adaptation from schlock-maestro Uwe Boll, featuring a distinguished (and slumming) cast.
